channel.title: Cosmic Mist
channel.description:
[b]Cosmic Mist[/b]
[b]Info:[/b]
Cosmic Mist is in development, this development is a MMORPG game. The creator is Joe Awwad; he is managing and running the development. This will be coded in C++ and Java. We are currently a big development and we are looking forward for the completion of the game. This will be free for all; there are no charges what so ever. We are looking very forward for the population of Cosmic Mist and would like to see how this roles.
Cosmic Mist will basically be a free and online game for everyone. We will have members and free users. As we know, we cannot host 100'000's of people on the one dedicated server so we must have several dedicated servers with different worlds. The gaming will be HD and will be 3D to all members. Full screen mode might/will be for paid members. This is a huge project as you all see, we are trying our hardest to make this your game and have what you want in it! I bet you are looking forward to this!
This is not very easy to get staff on the forum's or the game. This is a hard earning matter, which you must work hard to earn it. All staff members will have their own little image in game and on the forums beside their name. This may make people think a bit, we will have two forums on the one website. Of course we will have our game forums with boards, but i had some suggestions that i should open a second forum. The second forum will be a general forum with all the basics on it. We will have My Award’s and Tabbed Menu on that forum. Having two forums’ sound's awesome but its hard work running a game and two forums all at once so i will need some awesome help from you guy's to manage my second forums.
This will be a broswer game, we will need a server/source and a gaming client.
[b]Roles[/b]
Lead Developer - Leader of the development for the game base. [Java C#} Developers - Development for the game base. [Java C#} Lead Content Developer - Leader of the developers that develop content. [Java C#} Content Team - Development of language programming scripts. [Java C#} Designer - Design's graphics for the game or website. Detail Designer - Design's Intense and hard graphics. Graphic Designer - Normal and everyday graphics. Animators - Animates image's and NPC'S. Lead Modeler(s) - Model's Items, Objects, Monsters and NPCS (non-player character). Modeler(s) - Model's Items, Objects, Monsters and NPCS (non-player character). Lead Tester - Beta Test's the website and game when they have finished. Testers - Beta Test's the website, and game when they have finished. Lead Audio Media - Creates sound's and music tracks. Audio Media - Creates sound's and music tracks. Lead Character - Design's the player character and its clothing’s. Lead Character - Design's the player character and its clothing’s. Lead Web Developer - Develops the website using HTML and PHP. Web developer - Develops the website using HTML and PHP. Lead Programmers - General game programmer, scripts, suggestions. Event Manager - Discussion's on upcoming events and plans them. Lead GUI Artist - Creates professional GUI'S for the game client. GUI Artist - Creates Professional GUI'S for the game client. Director - Director is a development manager, he has a chart will all what needs to be done. Lead Advertiser - Advertise the game on site's and promotions. Advertiser - Advertise the game on site's and promotion's. Article/Writer - Creates article will 100% great grammar.
[b]Contact Details: Messenge : [email]CMDevelop@hotmail.com[/email] Skype : Cosmic.Mist[/b]

item.title: Cosmic Mist
item.dc:creator: @Chick_Pkz Chick Pkz
item.description:
@Chick_Pkz wrote:

Thanks guys, ive got alot of members. Anyone else interested?

Read full topic

What’s the base? Might apply for source coder, add my skype: bradley.carels

item.title: Cosmic Mist
item.dc:creator: @Chick_Pkz Chick Pkz
item.description:
@Chick_Pkz wrote:

Thanks, We are taking quality time, we are still searching for programmers and graphical artists, we are still recruiting the other other jobs, but they will not need to do anything for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Cosmic Mist
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

Hmm… This is a part of something new here. I know that everyone’s dreaming about own MMORPG game. But, if you really want to, you should be patient and wait till all those people will be filled. Take quality

I dunno how far that will go, but I wish you luck

Read full topic

Info:

Cosmic Mist is in development, this development is a MMORPG game. The creator is Joe Awwad; he is managing and running the development. This will be coded in C++ and Java. We are currently a big development and we are looking forward for the completion of the game. This will be free for all; there are no charges what so ever.
